item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: about
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://localhost/lumea-wp.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: about
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
About lumea

At Lumea, we believe that every space deserves a touch of warmth and wonder. Our candles are hand-poured with care, using natural waxes, fine fragrances, and clean-burning wicks. Inspired by light, nature, and quiet moments, each candle is crafted to soothe the senses and elevate the everyday. Whether you're setting the mood or seeking calm, Lumea brings light to your rituals.

item.dc:creator: admin

All posts

Latest products

Velvet Ember- Where Warmth Meets Elegance

Theres something magical about a flickering flame on a quiet evening. It invites stillness, stirs emotion, and transforms any space into a haven. With Velvet Ember, weve captured that feeling and bottled it in wax a scent designed to embrace your senses in warmth, depth, and undeniable luxury.

read more >>

Golden Hour Light That Warms the Soul

Theres a moment each day when the world turns soft, golden, and almost suspended in time a fleeting blend of light, warmth, and quiet beauty. That moment is the inspiration behind Golden Hour, a candle crafted to capture the peaceful glow of late afternoon sunlight and bring it into your space.

read more >>

Moonlight Rose A Fragrance of Nighttime Elegance

Under the hush of twilight, when petals glisten with dew and moonlight bathes the world in silver, something timeless stirs delicate, mysterious, and impossibly beautiful. Inspired by the romantic stillness of those late-night hours, Moonlight Rose is a candle that captures the soul of evening in scent and flame.

From the moment the wax begins to melt to the final flicker of a finished flame, candle making is more than just a craft its an experience rooted in ritual and intention.

item.title: Velvet Ember
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Velvet Ember Where Warmth Meets Elegance

Theres something magical about a flickering flame on a quiet evening. It invites stillness, stirs emotion, and transforms any space into a haven. With Velvet Ember, weve captured that feeling and bottled it in wax a scent designed to embrace your senses in warmth, depth, and undeniable luxury.

20 lv.

Unavailable

A Fragrance That Lingers Like a Memory

Velvet Ember isnt just a candle; its an experience.
Opening with a gentle whisper of black fig and smoked plum, this fragrance reveals a heart of warm amber, soft leather, and crushed rose petals sensual, yet sophisticated. As it settles, earthy sandalwood and a trace of burnt vanilla create a grounded, glowing finish that feels like a velvet evening wrapped in firelight.

Crafted with Intention

Each Velvet Ember candle is:

  • Hand-poured with 100% natural soy wax
  • Infused with phthalate-free, premium-grade oils
  • Equipped with a clean-burning cotton wick
  • Poured into a reusable, matte black glass jar for timeless style

We create in small batches to ensure the highest quality and a cleaner, longer burn perfect for slow evenings, thoughtful rituals, or intimate gatherings.

Why Choose Velvet Ember?

Velvet Ember is made for those who crave atmosphere. Whether you're setting the mood for a cozy night in, creating ambiance for a dinner party, or seeking a scent that reflects quiet strength and romance this candle delivers.

Its not just about scent. Its about feeling at home, feeling held, and letting a subtle flame transform your space.

item.title: Golden Hour
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Golden Hour Light That Warms the Soul

Theres a moment each day when the world turns soft, golden, and almost suspended in time a fleeting blend of light, warmth, and quiet beauty. That moment is the inspiration behind Golden Hour, a candle crafted to capture the peaceful glow of late afternoon sunlight and bring it into your space.

25 lv.

unavailable

A Scent Inspired by Sunset

Golden Hour is a radiant, feel-good fragrance that wraps you in comfort and calm. The journey begins with bright notes of mandarin and honeyed peach, evoking the fading sunlight of a summer day. At its heart lies golden amber and jasmine petals, gently unfolding into a soft base of warm vanilla and white woods. Its sunshine in scent form uplifting, mellow, and effortlessly beautiful.

A Candle for Every Moment

Golden Hour is perfect for winding down after a long day, welcoming guests with warmth, or simply creating that golden-hued atmosphere we all crave. Its the candle you light when you want your space to feel safe, sunny, and softly alive.

Handcrafted with Care

Each Golden Hour candle is:

  • Made from natural soy wax for a clean, even burn
  • Hand-poured in small batches
  • Infused with phthalate-free, premium fragrance oils
  • Finished in a soft matte vessel that glows when lit

Whether placed on a bedside table, in your living room, or as part of your self-care ritual, Golden Hour turns any corner into a golden escape.

item.title: Moonlight Rose
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Moonlight Rose A Fragrance of Nighttime Elegance

Under the hush of twilight, when petals glisten with dew and moonlight bathes the world in silver, something timeless stirs delicate, mysterious, and impossibly beautiful. Inspired by the romantic stillness of those late-night hours, Moonlight Rose is a candle that captures the soul of evening in scent and flame.

20 lv.

unavailable

A Scent That Whispers in the Dark

Moonlight Rose opens with a soft breeze of bergamot and green leaves, like a garden stirred gently by night air. At its heart, the scent blooms rich Damask rose entwined with night-blooming jasmine and peony, unfolding gracefully in the warm glow of candlelight. Anchored by subtle sandalwood, white musk, and a touch of amber, its a fragrance both airy and grounded like love letters left under the stars.

Handcrafted Elegance

Each Moonlight Rose candle is:

  • Hand-poured using 100% natural soy wax
  • Infused with phthalate-free, premium fragrance oils
  • Finished with a cotton wick for a clean, long-lasting burn
  • Presented in a frosted or blush-toned glass jar, designed to glow gently in dim light

Made in small batches, every candle is crafted with care to honor the quiet beauty of the night.

When to Burn

Moonlight Rose is perfect for:

  • Evening wind-downs
  • Romantic dinners
  • Thoughtful journaling
  • Self-care rituals and moonlit baths

Let it soften your space and calm your spirit a little luxury for your quietest moments.

item.title: Candle Making
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The Art of Candle Making: From Wax to Warmth

Theres something timeless and almost meditative about candle making a process that blends creativity, chemistry, and craftsmanship. From the moment the wax begins to melt to the final flicker of a finished flame, candle making is more than just a craft its an experience rooted in ritual and intention.

A History Illuminated

Candles have been used for centuries to light homes, guide travelers, and mark sacred moments. Today, while we may no longer rely on them for necessity, they continue to play a special role setting moods, calming minds, and adding a touch of beauty to everyday life.

The Essentials of Candle Making

At its heart, candle making involves just a few core ingredients: wax, wick, fragrance, and vessel. But like any good recipe, quality and care make all the difference.

  • Wax: Whether soy, beeswax, coconut, or a blend, the wax is the foundation. Each type offers unique qualities from burn time to scent throw.
  • Wick: A properly sized wick ensures your candle burns evenly and safely. Cotton and wood wicks are popular for their clean burn and aesthetic appeal.
  • Fragrance: From calming lavender to rich amber and spice, fragrance oils turn a simple candle into a sensory escape.
  • Vessel: The container isnt just functional it adds style, mood, and safety. Glass jars, ceramic bowls, and tins all offer unique charm.

From Pour to Flame: The Process

  1. Melting the Wax: Wax is gently melted to the ideal temperature to ensure it holds scent and pours smoothly.
  2. Adding Fragrance: Once cooled slightly, fragrance oils are stirred in to bond with the wax.
  3. Wicking & Pouring: Wicks are placed into jars, and the scented wax is poured carefully around them.
  4. Curing: Candles are left to cure for several days to allow the scent to settle and strengthen.
  5. Finishing Touches: Labels, lids, and packaging turn each candle into a gift for others or for yourself.

Why Handmade Matters

Hand-poured candles are crafted with precision and love. Unlike mass-produced options, small-batch candles allow for better quality control, personalized scents, and a deeper connection between maker and user. Each candle tells a story from its ingredients to the atmosphere it creates.

A Flame With Purpose

Candle making is more than a craft; its a way to slow down, reconnect with your senses, and bring intention into your space. Whether youre lighting a candle during your morning ritual or gifting one to someone special, it becomes part of a meaningful moment.

item.title: guidingLight
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Our Guiding Light

Inspired by the ethereal beauty of the skies and grounded in the quiet strength of the Earth, our candles are crafted to evoke both serenity and substance. Each one is a delicate balancelight as air in fragrance, yet rooted in natures purest materials. From hand-poured wax to botanical blends, our creations carry the essence of the natural world: unique, timeless, and enduring. Illuminate your moments with scents that soothe, designs that inspire, and craftsmanship that lingers long after the flame has faded.
